sentence.Network_en: They are minded , also, to establish the idolatrous forms of English Episcopacy.
sentence.Network_cn: 他们还想在这里建立起英国圣公会偶像崇拜的仪式.

PerfectNetExp.abs: pontifical中文 ... pontifical 教皇的主教制度 episcopacy 主教制度的 episcopal episcopalian.
主教制（episcopacy）主教一词源于希腊文episko-pos，原意为监督和巡视者。亦译监督或会督。
... episcopacy;episcopate 主教制 episcopacy;pontificate 主教职位 episcopal power 牧导职权.
...发主教战争(Bishops' Wars)。由于密尔顿本身也反对主教统辖制度(episcopacy)，他自然是站在苏格兰这边，反对查理一世派任主教 …

derivation.yuyuan_name: mid 17th cent.: from ecclesiastical Latin episcopatus 'episcopate', on the pattern of prelacy

auth_sentence.content: There is not the least smutt of Antichristianism in Episcopacy.

auth_sentence.res_content_con: There is not the least smutt of Antichristianism in Episcopacy.

auth_sentence.content: He was never a cordial friend to Episcopacy, but rather a patron of the Non-conformists.
